name: @toywar on GitHub
body:
### Welcome to toywar.github.com!
This is my homepage on GitHub community!
While I do not know why to use it, but most likely it will be linked to the activities of GitHub.

So, my project is currently:

* https://github.com/toywar/bootstrap
* https://github.com/toywar/admin_sys
* https://github.com/toywar/toywar.github.com

Fork my projects! :)

### Contact me
* http://www.toywar.ru - main profile page
* http://www.vk.com/toywar - on VK
* https://www.twitter.com/toywar (@toywar) - on Twitter
* https://www.github.com/toywar - on GitHub


### Use page-generator
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

> See you later!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
